backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the Poop Tracker backend with user registration, poop entry logging, profile retrieval, ranked user stats, and daily stats calculations stored in a principal-keyed map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (useProfile hook rewrite, App.tsx two-phase routing, safety timeout) to their source files, component dependencies, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key implementation details of each component, hook, page, and config file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the design system's color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Poop Tracker SPA, mounting the React app at the #root div and loading the main.tsx entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component implementing two-phase profile detection: shows a loading spinner while identity/actor/profile settle, applies a 10-second safety timeout, and routes to LoginPage, ProfileSetup, or Dashboard based on auth and profile state.
frontend/src/components/AllTimeStandings: Displays a sortable all-time rankings table with columns for poops, wipes, TP rolls, and avg wipes per poop, highlighting King Pooper and King Wiper with badges.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell layout providing a sticky header with logo, home/logout navigation buttons, a main content area, and a footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays a lifetime leaderboard card showing 'King Pooper' (most total poops) and 'King Wiper' (most total wipes) with an MVP badge if one user holds both titles. Uses ranked user stats from a query hook and shows skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePreview.t: Renders a user profile avatar as a styled circular emoji with a gradient background and colored border, optionally displaying the user's display name below it in configurable sizes.
frontend/src/constants/profileOptions.ts: Exports three arrays of customization options for user profiles: emoji choices, hex color values, and CSS gradient background strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data: user profile retrieval, profile registration, poop entry creation, and ranked user stats listing.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties for the app's design token system (colors, radius, etc.).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page showing a personalized welcome card, a quick 'Log a Poop' navigation button, the Leaderboard, AllTimeStandings components, and an informational about card.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that displays a branded card with an Internet Identity login button, using the useInternetIdentity hook to handle authentication.
frontend/src/pages/LogPoop.tsx: Multi-step page component for logging a poop entry, guiding the user through confirmation, wipe count input, and a success screen, then submitting via a mutation to the backend actor.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation page allowing users to set a display name and choose an emoji, color, and background, with a live preview and a mutation to register the profile on the backend.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via oklch variables, fonts, border radii, shadows, animations) and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the current version, feature list, architectural decisions, and known issues for the poop tracker app.
